name: @apicurio/artifact-type-builtins
description: Built-in functions and TypeScript type definitions for creating custom artifact types in Apicurio Registry

scripts.copy-generated: mkdir -p lib && cp ../app/target/classes/META-INF/quickjs4j/ArtifactTypeScriptProvider_Builtins.d.ts lib/ && cp ../app/target/classes/META-INF/quickjs4j/ArtifactTypeScriptProvider_Builtins.mjs lib/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-generated
scripts.prepublishOnly: test -f lib/ArtifactTypeScriptProvider_Builtins.d.ts && test -f lib/ArtifactTypeScriptProvider_Builtins.mjs || (echo 'Error: Generated files not found. Run npm run build first.' && exit 1)

author: Apicurio
